title: TYPO .32 -- a winner!
content:
Just found TYPO’s summer issue in my mailbox and boy — it’s a winner. Somehow these guys in Prague step up their game with each issue. The result: TYPO is now the best type magazine around.

Anyone care to differ?

\_ \_ \_  
Bert Vanderveen BNO

 [‹ My Helvetica got stuck in your iPhone](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201142813/http:/typophile.com/node/47507 "Go to previous forum topic") [critique tee shirt design (Threadless) ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201142813/http:/typophile.com/node/47519 "Go to next forum topic")
author: bert_vanderveen

comments.content:
Back when I was paying attention I always admired their  
shunning of italics, and reliance instead on demi weights  
for emphasis. But they were also very sharp overall too.

BTW, do they still release PDFs?

hhp
